document.full_text: wal-mart said that sales at its u.s. discount stores open at least a year fell 1.1 percent in its first quarter, marking its eighth straight quarterly decline.
document.title: wal-mart tops view; key sales down 1.1 percent
lines_and_colors: wal-mart said that sales at its u.s. discount stores open at least a year fell 1.1 percent in its first quarter, marking its eighth straight quarterly decline.
